titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the preseruation of grounds for making of salt-peeter, and to restore such grounds which now are destroyed, and to command assistance to be giuen to his Maiesties salt-peeter-makers.

James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the preseruation of grounds for making of salt-peeter, and to restore such grounds which now are destroyed, and to command assistance to be giuen to his Maiesties salt-peeter-makers.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Forbidding the paving over of dovecotes, cellars, stables, etc.--STC.
Dated at end: ... VVestminster, the sixe and twentieth day of December, in the two and twentieth yeere of our reigne ..
Arms 14; Steele notation: Our for 2) to 3) the 4) time for.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
